summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Municipal Light and Power System, authorizing amendatory agreements with Pend Oreille County on behalf of said county and certain school districts and towns located therein, for Loss of Revenues and additional financial burdens as contemplated by Chapter 252 Laws of Washington, 1955, all in connection with the City's construction and operation of the Boundary Hydroelectric project on the Pend Oreille River.
